des: "Easy and delicious! Great made a day or two before serving."
ins: Heat jam in a saucepan over medium heat; add cranberries, cinnamon, and allspice. Reduce heat to medium-low; cook, stirring frequently, until cranberries begin to pop, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from heat; stir in lemon zest. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to allow to thicken before serving.
